text: Hey, I made the changes you recommended to my showreel and added a new shot. If you have any free time to look at it I'd really appreciate it. I'm getting ready to start applying to jobs now - the ones that are still going at least! Framestore's internship is still running so I'm going for that. Here's the link: <https://vimeo.com/407711723> and the password is BlueNeighbourhood. All the best!
